questions.question: How do I search for housing on Eskan?
questions.answer: Simply log in as a regular user, select your target governorate, and use the search and filter options to find shared housing that matches your preferences like price, location, and amenities.

questions.question: How can I list my property?
questions.answer: Register as a property owner, submit your legal documents for verification, attend an online verification meeting, and then create your listing. Your first listing is free for three days!

questions.question: What does the verification process entail?
questions.answer: Property owners must submit legal documents and attend an online meeting via Zoom or Microsoft Teams. Our admins will review everything to ensure safety and authenticity.

questions.question: How does the subscription work for property owners?
questions.answer: After the free 3-day period for your first listing, you can choose a per-listing subscription or an annual plan to continue posting and managing your properties.

questions.question: How can I contact a property owner?
questions.answer: Regular users get 1-2 free contacts. For unlimited access to owner details, you can subscribe monthly or purchase a package with a set number of unlocks.
